DOC.brief_summary: The study seeks to establish if weight loss achieved through a program of intensive lifestyle management can result in improvements in GLP-1 and glycaemic control, in patients with newly diagnosed type 2 diabetes mellitus.
DOC.brief_title: Lifestyle Intervention in Patients With New Onset Type 2 Diabetes.
DOC.criteria: New onset type 2 Diabetes Body mass index 25 and above Able to give informed consent Hypoglycaemic and antiobesity agents, or any other prescription medication that may interfere with study results
